title: Michael Bloomberg: Big Tech wants AI into classrooms but the case against hasty adoption is compelling
description: AI businesses and even policymakers are rushing to push artificial intelligence into classrooms, promising a learning revolution. But the only prudent approach is to proceed with caution. Given the risks, until AI proves its worth, it’s best kept out.
content: In early September, as millions of children were returning to school, technology executives and government officials gathered at the White House to discuss their vision for American education, one in which struggling students are guided by chatbot tu... [3994 chars]

title: Can AI Music Ever Feel Human? The Answer Goes beyond the Sound
description: A personal experiment with the artificial intelligence music platform Suno’s latest model echoes a new preprint study. Most listeners can’t tell AI music from the real thing, but emotional resonance still demands a human story
content: This week I logged on to Suno, an artificial intelligence music platform. I had just read a new study that found that most participants couldn’t distinguish Suno’s music from human compositions, and I wanted to try it for myself. I thought of a song ... [6256 chars]

title: Over 1 lakh tech jobs lost in 2025; Amazon, Intel, TCS lead global layoffs amid AI pivot
description: From Silicon Valley to Bengaluru, tech giants are trimming staff to refocus on artificial intelligence, cloud services, and profitability after years of overexpansion during the pandemic.
content:
The wave of mass layoffs sweeping through the tech industry has intensified in 2025, with over 1,00,000 employees losing their jobs across 218 companies so far, according to data from Layoffs.fyi.

title: Zoho co-founder Sridhar Vembu on AI creativity: Why it lies outside the training distribution
description: Sridhar Vembu’s recent comments on artificial intelligence and creativity have stirred discussion within the tech community, while his endorsement of an unreviewed research paper linking vaccines and autism has drawn sharp criticism from medical professionals.
content: Zoho co-founder Sridhar Vembu has once again become a focal point in discussions concerning technology and public health. Known for his outspoken views, Vembu recently addressed the limitations of artificial intelligence (AI), particularly large lang... [4054 chars]

title: How Technology, AI, and Data Monetisation Are Reshaping the Future of Prop Funding and the Prop Trading Model
description: In the world of finance, the age‑old idea of an individual trader working with firm money – known as proprietary trading – is undergoing a quiet revolution. The dual themes of prop funding (that is, access to firm capital for traders) and the future of prop trading are being rewritten by technology, artificial intelligence (AI) and data […]

title: CBSE to teach AI from Class 3: Are the guardrails ready?
description: News News: The Ministry of Education has announced that Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Computational Thinking (CT) will become mandatory subjects from Class 3

title: Explained: Did PewDiePie's AI chatbots really rebel against him? Truth behind viral 'Council' experiment
description: YouTuber PewDiePie's artificial intelligence experiment took a dramatic turn. He created an AI council to answer questions. When some bots failed, he threatened deletion. This led to the AI system rebelling against him. The situation escalated into a digital standoff. PewDiePie's tech venture became a surprising conflict.

title: West Bengal Police to tie up with AI to curb crimes in state
description: The West Bengal Police have decided to tie up with Artificial Intelligence (AI) to curb crimes, said a police source on Saturday. An AI cell is going to be formed in the police department.
content:
